name: Nerkolept
description:
Use your villager to build houses, lumber camps and farms.

Houses allow you to create more villagers, lumber camps produce wood and farms produce food. Farms can only be built on grass. The others building can be built everywhere except the water of course.

After a given time called "a turn", you have to choose between two cards. Their are bonuses to help you to win. After that, a challenging card is revealed.

If your food reserves goes down and reach 0, all your villagers will start to starve until they die. If all your villagers die, you lose the game. If you survive 4 turns, you win. Good luck !
